recipe.title: How to Make Gyudon
recipe.intro: Gyudon is a Japanese beef bowl. Thin beef and onion are cooked in a sweet sauce and put on rice.
recipe.ingredients: thin beef slices, onion, rice, soy sauce, sugar, mirin, water, ginger
steps: **Cook** the rice in a rice cooker.
**Mix** soy sauce, sugar, mirin, and water in a pan.
**Add** the onion and ginger and cook for 3 minutes.
**Put** the beef in the pan and cook for 5 minutes.
**Put** the beef and sauce on the rice in a bowl. **Enjoy!**

review.content: I visited Sunset Bowl Cafe on Saturday evening. It was near the Sydney Opera House. I could see the sunset over the harbour. The sky was orange and pink. It was so beautiful. I ordered the gyudon. The beef was tender and the sauce was sweet. The rice was hot and fluffy. The cafe was small and quiet. I felt very relaxed there. It was a wonderful evening.
